Class Library

java.lang.Object
Patron
Library
public class Library extends Patron
Represents a library, including its collection of items, authors, and patrons.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Library()
    Constructs a new Library with default attributes.

    Constructs a new Library with the specified attributes.

      public Library(List<LibraryItem> libraryItems, List<Author> authors, List<Patron> patrons)

      Parameters:
      libraryItems - the list of items in the library
      authors - the list of authors
      patrons - the list of patrons

      Constructs a new Library with default attributes.

  • Method Details

    • searchItems

      public List<LibraryItem> searchItems(String query)
      Searches the library for items that match the given query.
      Parameters:
      query - the query to search for
      Returns:
      a list of matching items

      Returns:
      a list of matching authors

      Parameters:
      query - the query to search for
      Returns:
      a list of matching patrons

    • borrowItem

      public void borrowItem(Patron patron, LibraryItem item)
      borrows an item to a patron.
      Parameters:
      patron - the patron that will borrow the item
      item - the item to be borrowed

      item - the item to be returned

      public void editLibraryItem(int id, String newTitle, String newAuthor, String newISBN, String newPublisher, int newCopyNum)
      edits an item in the library
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the item to be edited
      newTitle - the new title of the item
      newAuthor - the new author of the item
      newISBN - the new ISBN of the item
      newPublisher - the new publisher of the item
      newCopyNum - the new copy number of the item
